Omaha.Lauritzen Gardens:
Lauritzen Gardens - Omaha's Botanical Center, (formally Omaha Botanical Gardens)  are a botanical gardens and an arboretum located at 100 Bancroft Street in the South Omaha neighborhood Omaha, Nebraska. The gardens are open daily during business hours; an admission fee is charged.


== About ==
The gardens began in 1982, following two years of preliminary planning.
